            <string language="hu-HU">A korai görög filozófia</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Early Greek Philosophy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Frühe Griechische Philosophie</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A korai görög filozófia szakaszolása és meghatározó filozófusai</string>
            <string language="en-US">The early Greek philosophy sectioning and his determining philosophers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">filozófia</string>

          </keyword>

seine feststellenphilosophen</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Premier sectionnement grec de la philosophie et

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Secionar grego adiantado da filosofia e seus

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezionare greco iniziale di filosofia ed i suoi

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πρώτοι ελληνικοί τεμαχίζοντας φιλοσοφίας και 
καθοριστικοί φιλόσοφοί του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El seccionar griego temprano de la filosofía y
